entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
